name: MariaDB DevContainer
postStartCommand: sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /workspace && sudo service mariadb start && sleep 3 && sudo mariadb -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS WorkHubDB; CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'vscode'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY ''; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON WorkHubDB.* TO 'vscode'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES;" && python3 .devcontainer/create_db.py
